name: Rocket Boom
description:
Prove yourself as a skilled rocket pilot and land your ship on a green landing pad. And don't expect it to be a piece of cake ...

p.s. this is a developer prototype puild, where special controls are enabled for testing purposes ("C" for invulnerability to collisions and "L" for the next level). 

You can downlaod the unity project here: https://github.com/Fabsoll/RocketBoom
